sections.name: page_1
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"End Phantoms can be fished up from the end void.\n\nThey are larger and stronger than normal phantoms, but have a chance to drop a broken elytra upon death."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.everstone.2"}]}]
